metadata.name: Lovesick Himé 03 - Marielle
metadata.description:
“What is a commoner like you doing here? Don’t you know who I am?? I’m Lady Marielle, born into the noble Knightford family. 

Are you another one of those bachelors sent by my grandfather? Ugh, please. He thinks I need a companion but I've told him so many times, It's hard to find the person who fits my standards... 
... 

Well, since you're here, just get on with it! I know I’m rich and pretty, but don’t just stand and stare! Show me who you are! I’ll decide if you’re worth my time.”

Marielle Knightford is a hard woman to impress; Always surrounded by people always using cheap flattery, she will not easily fall for anyone. Enter your bid to prove to Marielle that you are the one for her heart. 

The owner of this NFT will also receive the right to use this character design in both commercial and non-commercial projects.
